comment._content: William Fish, The Blackburn Murderer (raped and murdered a 7 year old girl, Fish was hanged on Monday, August 14th, 1876, at Kirkdale Prison, Liverpool) www.truecrimelibrary.com/crime_series_show.php?id=389&...
